statements: SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE amount > 100
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM payment_history WHERE transaction_date = '2021-10-15'
SELECT amount, transaction_date FROM payment_history WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 150 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount, transaction_date FROM payment_history WHERE customer_id = 456
SELECT * FROM payment_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, AVG(amount) FROM payment_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(amount) > 1000
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_date FROM payment_history WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 AND customer_id = 3
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM payment_history
SELECT * FROM payment_history ORDER BY transaction_date ASC, customer_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM customer;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date = '2023-01-15' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE customer_id = 2002 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history JOIN customer ON transaction_history.customer_id = customer.customer_id WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%' AND transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM payment_history;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM payment_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customer ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_status WHERE status_name = 'Pending';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customer WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM payment_history WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;

SELECT * FROM customer INNER JOIN payment_history ON customer.customer_id = payment_history.customer_id WHERE customer.first_name = 'John' AND payment_history.amount < 500 ORDER BY customer.last_name ASC, payment_history.amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM payment_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM payments WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY payment_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY customer_id, transaction_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, customer_id, transaction_date, amount FROM payments WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT th.customer_id, th.transaction_date, th.amount, c.customer_name FROM transaction_history th JOIN customers c ON th.customer_id = c.customer_id;

SELECT t.payment_id, t.amount, c.customer_name, th.transaction_date FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON t.payment_id = c.customer_id JOIN transaction_history th ON c.customer_id = th.customer_id WHERE t.amount < 5000 ORDER BY th.transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Transaction;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM Transaction WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM Customer ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PaymentMethod WHERE method_type = 'Credit Card';
SELECT transaction_id, status FROM PaymentStatus WHERE payment_status_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM Transaction WHERE transaction_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM Transaction WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM Customer ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PaymentMethod WHERE method_type = 'Credit Card' AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Customer WHERE name = 'John Doe');
SELECT transaction_id, payment_date FROM PaymentHistory WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
